Let's start with a first part adoption.

The three have to come from different countries.

India taxes such as via T will not be eligible a exchange losses will not be eligible provisions for future losses will not be eligible or, for example, a funding that you have a course that you have charged to another community project that you have with the European Commission of course will not be eligible.

A different flat rate for andrikos.

If they're participating in funding schemes where their research and technological development and demonstration activities, and only if they don't have an accounting system that allows them to identify with clearly which are there under cost.

Payment.

Program is not only for your project, so if there is not enough.
